ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name <> 'Sapper_CSS', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Salesforce Admin', $Profile.Name <> 'Quality/Training Staff', $Profile.Name <> 'Project Team Leader', $Profile.Name <> 'Accounting Generalist', OR( Implementation_Director_Approved__c = TRUE ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not the implementation director you can't approve this
